Steam (ST): It was only natural. Nanjo was a guest just like the rest of them. He'd come just now to pass the time in the parlor until breakfast.
Umineko Project (UP): It was only natural. Nanjo was a guest like the rest of them. He had just now come to pass the time in the parlor until breakfast.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 無理もない。南條も自分たちと同じ、客なのだ。起床し、朝食までの時間を客間で過ごそうとやってきたばかりなのだ。
Russian (RU): Тут нечему было удивляться. Нанджо был гостем, как и остальные, за исключением Джессики. Он только что направлялся в гостиную, чтобы скоротать там время до начала завтрака.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era natural. Nanjo era um hóspede assim como o resto deles. Ele havia acabado de chegar para passar o tempo na sala de visitas até o café da manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這也怪不得南條。南條和他們一樣，同是客人。他是起了床之後，想在客廳裡消磨一下早餐前的時間，才剛剛來到這裡的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这也怪不得南条。南条和他们一样，同是客人。他是起了床之后，想在客厅里消磨一下早餐前的时间，才刚刚来到这里的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era naturale. Nanjo era un ospite come il resto degli altri. Era appena arrivato per passare il tempo fino a colazione.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era naturale. Anche Nanjo era un ospite, esattamente come loro. Si era alzato dal letto un attimo prima, per poter ammazzare il tempo in salotto fino all'ora della colazione.
Turkish (TR): Bu çok doğaldı. Nanjo da diğerleri gibi misafirdi. Kahvaltıya kadar salonda vakit geçirmek için gelmişti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Uu-uu-uu-!! Doctor Nanjo, Mama took it, Mama took my letter!! Give it back, give it back, uu-uu-uu-!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu‐uu‐uu!! Doctor Nanjo, Mama took it, Mama took my letter!! Give it back, give it back, uu‐uu‐uu!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-uu-uu-!! Doctor Nanjo, Mama took it, Mama took Maria's letter!! Give it back, give it back, uu-uu-uu-!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うーうーうー！！　南條先生、ママが取った、ママが真里亞のお手紙取ったの！！　返して返して、うーうーうー！！！」
Russian (RU): "У‐у, у‐у, у‐у! Доктор Нанджо, мама взяла его, мама взяла письмо Марии! Отдайте его, отдайте его, у‐у, у‐у, у‐у!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu‐uu‐uu!! Doutor Nanjo, a mamãe pegou, a mamãe pegou a carta da Maria!! Devolva, devolva, uu‐uu‐uu!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——嗚——嗚——！！南條大夫，媽媽拿走了，媽媽把真里亞的信拿走了！！還給我還給我，嗚——嗚——嗚——！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——呜——呜——！！南条大夫，妈妈拿走了，妈妈把真里亚的信拿走了！！还给我还给我，呜——呜——呜——！！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Uu-uu-uu-!! Dottor Nanjo, Mamma l'ha presa, Mamma ha preso la lettera di Maria!! Ridammela, ridammela, uu-uu-uu-!!!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Uuh, uuh, uuh!! Dottor Nanjo, mamma l'ha presa, mamma ha preso la lettera di Maria!! Ridammela, ridammela, uuh, uuh, uuh!!!"
Turkish (TR): "Uu-uu-uu!! Doktor Nanjo, annem aldı, annem Maria'nın mektubunu aldı!! Geri ver, geri ver, uu-uu-uu!!!"

Steam (ST): Maria buried her face in Nanjo's plump stomach, sobbing and crying.
Umineko Project (UP): Maria buried her face in Nanjo's well‐built stomach, sobbing and crying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria buried her face in Nanjo's well-built stomach, sobbing and crying.

Russian (RU): Мария уткнулась лицом в плотный живот Нанджо, рыдая и крича.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria enterrou o seu rosto na barriga avantajada de Nanjo, soluçando e chorando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞一邊抽抽搭搭地哭著，一邊把臉埋進了南條發福的肚子裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚一边抽抽搭搭地哭着，一边把脸埋进了南条发福的肚子里。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Maria affondò il viso nel pancione di Nanjo, piangendo a più non posso...
Turkish (TR): Maria yüzünü Nanjo'nun dolgun karnına gömmüş, hıçkıra hıçkıra ağlıyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Nanjo could do nothing but be bewildered at what was going on so early in the morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …南條は、早朝から一体何が起こっているのかと困惑する他なかった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Nanjo não podia fazer nada além de ficar estupefato pelo que estava acontecendo tão cedo de manhã.

Chinese Simplified (CN): …南条不知所措，只好困惑起了这一大早的究竟发生了什么事。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nanjo non poteva fare a meno di sentirsi disorientato da tutti questi eventi avvenuti così presto nel mattino.
Turkish (TR): ...Nanjo sabahın bu erken saatinde olup bitenler karşısında hayrete kapılmaktan başka bir şey yapamadı.

Steam (ST): Maria's sobbing had become so unmanageable, they wanted to ask someone—anyone—where Rosa was.
Umineko Project (UP): Maria's sobbing had become so unmanageable, they wanted to ask someone, anyone, where Rosa was.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria's sobbing had become so unmanageable, they wanted to ask someone, anyone, where Rosa was.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma i due domestici ignorarono completamente la mano agitata da Jessica.

Umineko Project (UP): Gohda flew into the servant room, and Kanon, noticing that Nanjo was here, bowed and approached him at a quick pace, and whispered something into his ear.

Umineko Project (UP): So Rosa had to make an adult decision, and stop Jessica in her hasty rampage. Gohda and Kanon realized that immediately, and chased after her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So Rosa made an adult decision, and had to stop Jessica in her hasty rampage. Gohda and Kanon realized that immediately, and chased after her.
PC Japanese (JP): だから楼座は大人の判断から、朱志香の短絡的な暴走を止めさせなければならなかった。すぐにそれを郷田も嘉音も理解し、その背中を追った。
Russian (RU): Поэтому Роза приняла взрослое решение и попыталась удержать Джессику от эмоционального поступка. Года и Канон сразу же это поняли и бросились за ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, Rosa teve que tomar uma decisão adulta, e parar Jessica em seu alvoroço apressado. Gohda e Kanon perceberam isso imediatamente, e seguiram atrás dela.

Russian (RU): Накатило какое‐то ощущение, что с того момента, как вчера хлынул дождь... Нет... После того, как остров оказался накрыт тайфуном, что‐то словно сошло с ума.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece como se desde que a chuva começou ontem — não, ...desde que a ilha foi envolvida pelo tufão, algo começou a ficar estranho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 總覺得，從昨天開始下雨時起。不，…在這個島被台風包圍之時起，就有什麼變得不對勁了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 总觉得，从昨天开始下雨时起。不，…在这个岛被台风包围之时起，就有什么变得不对劲了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un po' come se, da quando ieri aveva iniziato a piovere... no... da quando l'isola era stata avvolta dal tifone, qualcosa fosse impazzito.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mi sembrava che fosse cominciato tutto con la pioggia del giorno prima. No... era da quando l'isola era stata avvolta dal tifone che qualcosa aveva preso una brutta piega.
Turkish (TR): Sanki dün yağmur başladığından beri—hayır, ...ada tayfuna yakalandığından beri bir şeyler çığırından çıkmıştı.

Steam (ST): It was bright and sunny when I arrived on Rokkenjima, but since I'd gotten up early and was sleepy, I took a nap.
Umineko Project (UP): I had arrived in Rokkenjima while it was clear, and taken a nap because I had gotten up early.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had arrived in Rokkenjima while it was clear, and taken a nap because I had gotten up early.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は晴れている内に六軒島を訪れ、朝が早かったので眠くなり昼寝をした。
Russian (RU): Я прибыл на Роккенджиму в ясную погоду и решил вздремнуть, поскольку рано встаю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estava claro e ensolarado quando eu cheguei em Rokkenjima, então tirei uma cochilo porque eu tinha levantado cedo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我在天還晴著的時候到了六軒島，然後由於早上起得早，犯困睡了個午覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我在天还晴着的时候到了六轩岛，然后由于早上起得早，犯困睡了个午觉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Io sono arrivato a Rokkenjima quando era bel tempo, e ho fatto un pisolino perché mi ero svegliato presto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ero arrivato a Rokkenjima mentre c'era bel tempo, e visto che mi ero svegliato presto e avevo sonno, feci un pisolino...
Turkish (TR): Rokkenjima'ya hava henüz açıkken varmıştım ve erken kalktığım için biraz kestirmiştim.

Steam (ST): ...When I woke up, it had already started raining.
Umineko Project (UP): ......When I woke up, it had already started raining.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……起きた時にはもう雨が降り出していた。
Russian (RU): ......Когда же я проснулся, уже начался дождь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Quando eu acordei, a chuva já havia começado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……等醒來時，天已經在下雨了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……等醒来时，天已经在下雨了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quando mi sono alzato, aveva già iniziato a piovere.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando mi svegliai, aveva già iniziato a piovere.
Turkish (TR): ......Uyandığımda yağmur çoktan başlamıştı.

Steam (ST): And ever since that time...
Umineko Project (UP): And after I got up, that's when it all started.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And since that time...
PC Japanese (JP): そして起きた時からだ。
Russian (RU): И с того времени...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E depois que me levantei, foi quando tudo começou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後從我睡醒時開始。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后从我睡醒时开始。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E da quel momento...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tutto era iniziato da allora.
Turkish (TR): Ve her şey, ben uyandıktan sonra başladı.

Steam (ST): Suddenly, a mysterious visitor calling herself the Golden Witch {f:5:Beatrice} arrived, and it felt like I was sinking bit by bit into a bizarre world.
Umineko Project (UP): Suddenly a mysterious visitor had arrived, calling herself the Golden Witch {f:5:Beatrice}, and it feels like the world had started skewing bit by bit into something insane.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Suddenly, a mysterious visitor had arrived, calling herself the Golden Witch Beatrice, and it felt like I was sinking bit by bit into an insane world.
PC Japanese (JP): いつの間にか、黄金の魔女ベアトリーチェを名乗る謎の客人が来ていて、何だかおかしな世界に少しずつ傾いていた気がする。
Russian (RU): Неожиданно объявилась таинственная гостья, называющая себя Золотой Ведьмой {f:5:Беатриче}, и я ощутил, словно потихоньку погружаюсь в мир безумия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Repentinamente, uma visitante misteriosa tinha chegado, chamando a si mesma de Bruxa Dourada {f:5:Beatrice}, e senti como se eu estivesse afundando pouco a pouco em um mundo completamente bizarro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就在不知不覺間，多了個自稱是黃金的魔女貝阿朵莉切的神秘客人，不由得讓我感到此處正在一點一點地傾斜向不正常的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就在不知不觉间，多了个自称是黄金的魔女贝阿朵莉切的神秘客人，不由得让我感到此处正在一点一点地倾斜向不正常的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Improvvisamente, una misteriosa visitatrice era arrivata, chiamando se stessa la Strega Dorata Beatrice, ed era come se stessi affondando a poco a poco in un mondo di follia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dal nulla era giunta una misteriosa visitatrice che si faceva chiamare {f:5:Beatrice}, la Strega Dorata, e fu come sprofondare gradualmente in un regno di follia.
Turkish (TR): Birdenbire kendisine Altın Cadı {f:5:Beatrice} diyen gizemli bir konuk gelmişti ve sanki dünya yavaş yavaş çılgınca bir hâle dönüşmeye başlamıştı.

Steam (ST): What the heck happened while I was napping? Am I supposed to believe this island was sealed off inside a different world, where common sense doesn't apply...?!
Umineko Project (UP): What happened while I was taking that nap? During that time, had this island been cut off, trapped in a different world where common sense doesn't apply...?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Had something happened while I was asleep? During that time, had this island been cut off, trapped in a different world where common sense didn't apply...?!
PC Japanese (JP): 俺が昼寝している間に何があったってんだ？　その間に、この島はこの世の常識の通用しない異世界へ切り取られちまったってのか…？！
Russian (RU): Что‐то случилось, пока я спал? Неужели за это время остров оказался изолирован, переместившись в другой мир, где не действует здравый смысл?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que aconteceu enquanto eu estava tirando um cochilo? Eu deveria acreditar que durante esse tempo, a ilha rompeu suas ligações com o mundo exterior, e foi aprisionada em um universo paralelo onde o senso comum não se aplica...?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我在睡午覺時到底發生了什麼？在這段時間裡，這個島被切離進了無法通用人世上常識的異世界嗎…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我在睡午觉时到底发生了什么？在这段时间里，这个岛被切离进了无法通用人世上常识的异世界吗…？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era successo qualcosa mentre stavo dormendo? Durante quel momento, l'isola era forse stata separata, intrappolata in un mondo diverso dove il buon senso non veniva applicato...?!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Cos'era avvenuto mentre mi stavo riposando? Che in quel lasso di tempo, l'isola fosse stata tranciata via e spedita verso un altro reame, in cui il buon senso non aveva validità...?!
Turkish (TR): Ben uyurken neler oldu? Bu süre zarfında, bu adanın bağlantısı kesilmiş, sağduyunun geçerliliğini yitirdiği farklı bir dünyaya mı hapsolmuştu...?

Steam (ST): Who is this person called {f:5:Beatrice}? Is some unknown person trying to involve themselves with the inheritance problem, just like our parents were freaking out about at dinner last night?
Umineko Project (UP): Who is this person called {f:5:Beatrice}?{n}Is she some unknown person trying to involve themselves with the inheritance problem, like our parents were freaking out about at dinner last night?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Who is this person called Beatrice? Was some unknown person trying to involve themselves with the inheritance problem, like our parents were freaking out about at dinner last night?
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェというのは何者なんだ。昨日の晩餐で親父たちが騒いでいたように、遺産相続問題に絡もうとする未知の人物なのか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ベアトリーチェというのは何者なんだ。{n}昨日の晩餐で親父たちが騒いでいたように、遺産相続問題に絡もうとする未知の人物なのか。
Russian (RU): Кто эта особа, зовущая себя {f:5:Беатриче}?{n}Пытался ли кто‐то неизвестный вмешаться в решение проблемы с наследством, чего так опасались наши родители за ужином вчера вечером?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quem é esta pessoa chamada {f:5:Beatrice}?{n}Ela é alguma pessoa desconhecida tentando se envolver com o problema da herança, como nossos pais estavam discutindo sobre no jantar noite passada?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這叫貝阿朵莉切的，究竟是何方神聖？{n}她是昨天晚餐席上老爸他們亂作一團時說的那種，想在遺產繼承問題裡插一腳的陌生人嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这叫贝阿朵莉切的，究竟是何方神圣？{n}她是昨天晚餐席上老爸他们乱作一团时说的那种，想在遗产继承问题里插一脚的陌生人吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chi è questa persona chiamata Beatrice? Era qualche sconosciuta che provava ad immischiarsi nel problema dell'eredità, a proposito della quale i nostri genitori stavano impazzendo a cena la scorsa notte?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Chi era questa persona dal nome di {f:5:Beatrice}?{n}Era un individuo ignoto che tentava di immischiarsi nella questione dell'eredità, proprio come avevano pensato i nostri genitori durante il macello della cena scorsa?
Turkish (TR): {f:5:Beatrice} denen bu kişi de kim?{n}Dün akşam yemeğinde bizimkilerin çıldırdığı gibi, miras sorununa karışmaya çalışan bilinmeyen biri mi?

Steam (ST): ...Or is the culprit this witch from the Legend of the Gold, just like Maria said?!
Umineko Project (UP): ......Or is the culprit the witch from the Legend of the Gold, like Maria says?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Or was this witch from the Legend of the Gold the culprit, like Maria said?!
PC Japanese (JP): ……それとも真里亞がのたまうように、黄金伝説の魔女さまが犯人だってのかよ？！
Russian (RU): ......Или же преступником является эта ведьма из легенды о золоте, как и говорит Мария?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ou o culpado é a bruxa da Lenda do Ouro, assim como a Maria disse?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……還是如真里亞所言，那個黃金傳說中的魔女夫人就是犯人呢？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……还是如真里亚所言，那个黄金传说中的魔女夫人就是犯人呢？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... O la colpevole era questa strega della Leggenda dell'Oro, come ha detto Maria?!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Oppure il colpevole era l'illustre strega della leggenda dell'oro, come aveva detto Maria?!
Turkish (TR): ......Yoksa suçlu, Maria'nın dediği gibi Altın Efsanesi'ndeki cadı mı?!

Steam (ST): Even if we set Jessica's temper aside, given the circumstances, it's probably safe to say that this visitor person is the most suspicious.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if Jessica hadn't let her short temper get the better of her, in this situation, the visitor was probably the most suspicious.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香が短気を起こすまでもなく、この状況下ではその来客が一番怪しいだろう。
Russian (RU): Даже если бы Джессика и не дала волю своему вспыльчивому характеру, в данной ситуации гостья была наиболее подозрительна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se a Jessica não tivesse deixado seu curto temperamento tomar conta dela, dadas as circunstâncias, a visitante provavelmente era a mais suspeita.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 都不用朱志香性急下判斷，這情況下本就是那位客人最可疑吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 都不用朱志香性急下判断，这情况下本就是那位客人最可疑吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se Jessica non avesse lasciato che la sua impulsività avesse la meglio su di lei, in questa situazione, l'ospite era probabilmente la più sospetta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche se Jessica non avesse perso la calma, in un caso come quello, l'ospite sarebbe stata la più sospettata fra tutti.
Turkish (TR): Eğer Jessica çabuk öfkelenmesine izin vermemiş olsaydı bile, bu durumda o konuk muhtemelen en şüpheli kişiydi.

Steam (ST): But we mustn't make up our minds based on that alone. Aaah, it's useless, it's useless, it's all useless...!!
Umineko Project (UP): But we mustn't jump to conclusions just like that.{n}Yeah, that's no good, no good, no goddamn good at all...!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, we couldn't decide just like that. Aaah, it's useless, it's useless, it's all useless...!!
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、それで決め付けちゃ駄目だ。あぁ駄目だ駄目だ、全然駄目だぜ…！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、それで決め付けちゃ駄目だ。{n}あぁ駄目だ駄目だ、全然駄目だぜ…！！
Russian (RU): Впрочем, мы не можем вот так всё решить.{n}А‐а‐ах, всё без толку, без толку, без толку!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas não devemos pular para conclusões assim como essa.{n}Aah, isso não está certo, não está nada certo...!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，就這麼去一口咬定可不行。{n}啊啊不行啊不行啊，完全不行啊…！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，就这么去一口咬定可不行。{n}啊啊不行啊不行啊，完全不行啊…！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non potevamo prendere una decisione in questo modo. Aaah, è inutile, è inutile, è tutto inutile...!!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, non potevamo prendere una decisione in questo modo.{n}Aaah, era inutile, inutile, era tutto inutile...!!
Turkish (TR): Ama öylece sonuca atlamamalıyız.{n}Evet, bu hiç iyi değil, hiç iyi değil, hiç de iyi değil...!!!

Steam (ST): I smacked my face with both hands again, cooling off my brains before they overloaded. Even though it might've been a wasted effort...
Umineko Project (UP): I smacked my face with both hands again, cooling off my brain before it overheated. Even though it might have been a waste of effort.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I smacked my face with both hands again, cooling off my brains before they got too hot. Even though it might have been a wasted effort.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺はもう一度顔面を両手でぴしゃりと叩き付け、加熱した脳みそを冷やした。焼け石に水かもしれないとしても。
Russian (RU): Я шлепнул себя по лицу руками, давая остыть голове, которая уже была готова закипеть. Даже если это напрасные усилия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu continuei batendo na minha cara com ambas as mãos, esfriando meu cérebro antes que ele superaquecesse. Mesmo que isso possa ser um desperdício de esforço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我又一次用雙手“啪”地一聲拍了下臉，想將加熱了的腦子冷卻下來。就算只是杯水車薪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我又一次用双手“啪”地一声拍了下脸，想将加热了的脑子冷却下来。就算只是杯水车薪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Colpii la mia faccia con entrambe le mani ancora una volta, rinfrescandomi le idee prima che entrassi in confusione. Nonostante fosse uno sforzo inutile.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mi schiaffeggiai la faccia con entrambe le mani un'altra volta, raffreddando la mia testa fumante. Anche se era come versare un bicchiere d'acqua in una fornace.
Turkish (TR): İki elimle yüzüme tekrar vurarak beynimi aşırı yüklenmeden önce soğumasını sağladım. Her ne kadar boşa bir çaba olsa da...

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "...This......is one of Grandfather's envelopes."
Umineko Project (UP): "......This is.........one of Grandfather's envelopes."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......This is, .........Grandfather's envelope."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……これは、………お祖父さまの封筒。」
Russian (RU): "......Это... дедушкин конверт."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Este é.........um dos envelopes do vovô."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這是，………爺爺的信封。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这是，………爷爷的信封。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questa è... la busta del Nonno."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "....Questa è... una busta di nostro nonno."
Turkish (TR): "......Bu.........büyükbabamın zarflarından biri."

Steam (ST): On a tray piled up with sweets that decorated the table, George-aniki found a Western envelope that had the Ushiromiya family crest done on it in gold leaf.
Umineko Project (UP): On a tray piled up with sweets that decorated the table, George‐aniki found a Western envelope which had the Ushiromiya family crest done on it in gold leaf.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On a tray piled up with sweets that decorated the table, George-aniki found a western envelope which had the Ushiromiya family crest done on it in gold leaf.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治の兄貴が、テーブル上に飾るように盛り付けられた菓子皿の上に、右代宮家の紋章を箔押しした洋形封筒が置かれているのを見つける。
Russian (RU): На украшавшей стол тарелке со сладостями Джордж‐аники обнаружил западный конверт с гербом семьи Уширомия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em uma bandeja empilhada com doces que decorava a mesa, o George‐aniki encontrou um envelope ocidental o qual tinha o brasão da família Ushiromiya feito com folha de ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治大哥發現，像是在裝點桌子而擺放著的糖果盤上，放著封鑲有右代宮家紋章的西式信封。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治大哥发现，像是在装点桌子而摆放着的糖果盘上，放着封镶有右代宫家纹章的西式信封。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Su un vassoio che decorava il tavolo ammassata con dei dolci, George-aniki trovò una busta in stile occidentale che aveva su di essa il simbolo della famiglia Ushiromiya fatto con lamina dorata.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Su un vassoio per torte posto a decorazione del tavolo, il fratellone George trovò una busta in stile occidentale, in cui era inciso in oro l'emblema della famiglia Ushiromiya.
Turkish (TR): George-aniki masayı süsleyen tatlılarla dolu bir tepsinin üzerinde Ushiromiya ailesinin armasının altın yaprakla işlendiği Batı tarzı bir zarf buldu.

Steam (ST): And, it was unopened.
Umineko Project (UP): And it was unopened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And it was unopened.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれは未開封だった。
Russian (RU): И он не был вскрыт.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ele não estava aberto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且這還是沒開封過的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且这还是没开封过的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E non era aperta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ed era sigillata.
Turkish (TR): Ve açılmamıştı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Which means...it's probably meant for us, right? If it was something Dad and the others read, it should be open."
Umineko Project (UP): "So, ......doesn't this mean it was sent to us? If it was something Dad and the rest read, it should be open."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「ってことは、……それは俺たち宛てってことじゃねぇのか。親父たちが読んだものだったなら開封されてるはずだぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ってことは、……それは俺たち宛てってことじゃねぇのか。親父たちが読んだものだったなら開封されてるはずだぜ」
Russian (RU): "Итак... Не получается ли, что это послание для нас? Если бы его читали отец и остальные, то конверт наверняка был бы вскрыт."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então, ......isso não significa que foi deixado aqui para nós? Se fosse algo que meu pai e o resto leram, isso deveria estar aberto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「照這麼看，……這是不是就是留給我們的呢？如果是老爸他們看過的信，那應該是已經開封了的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「照这么看，……这是不是就是留给我们的呢？如果是老爸他们看过的信，那应该是已经开封了的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quindi... significa che è indirizzata a noi? Se fosse qualcosa che Papà e gli altri hanno letto, dovrebbe essere aperta."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Quindi... vuol dire che è indirizzata a noi? Se fosse stata letta dal mio vecchio e dagli altri, sarebbe dovuta essere aperta."
Turkish (TR): "Yani, ......bu bize gönderildiği anlamına gelmiyor mu? Babam ve diğerlerinin okuduğu bir şey olsaydı, açık olması gerekirdi."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "...It seems your reasoning is correct. ...It's written right here. Someone wrote "to those who remain"."

Steam (ST): "...In other words, it's something like this. If these murders represent her collecting interest, then she's telling us to try and find the gold she gave Grandfather if we want her to stop... And, she's also saying that the secret pointing to the gold is hidden in the portrait epitaph."
Umineko Project (UP): "......So it's something like this. If the motive for these murders was collection of the interest, the condition for stopping them is to find the hidden gold she gave to Grandfather, ...is what it's saying. And it also says that the secret to this is hidden in the epitaph from that portrait."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......In other words, it's something like this.
